definitions.definition: Something to play with, especially as intended for use by a child.
definitions.example: A grown man does not play with a child’s toy.

definitions.definition: A thing of little importance or value; a trifle.
A simple, light piece of music, written especially for the virginal.
A vague fancy, a ridiculous idea or notion; a whim.
An old story; a silly tale.
A headdress of linen or wool that hangs down over the shoulders, worn by old women of the lower classes; called also toy mutch.
A sex toy (object or device to give sexual pleasure).
To play (with) in an idle or desultory way.
definitions.example: Figo is toying with the English defence.
I have been toying with the idea of starting my own business.

definitions.definition: To stimulate with a sex toy.
